document_data.mainbody:
tu Barua was a seneschal in the service of Ifan Talroa, a merchant prince of Port Nyanzaru in Chult during the late 15 century DR.
He often made trips to Port Nyanzarus Bazaar to run errands for his master.
During the events of the death curse, he contacted the Bazaars Master of the Market to find an armorer who could supply titansteel armor.
